project_list.text: After Lexington High School changed their schedule to a more confusing 6-day rotation, I made [Blocks](https://blocks.elk.sh), a progressive web app that more than 900 students and teachers regularly use to check their schedule.
While procrastinating my homework, I made [Progress](/progress) to see how much of the year we had made it through.
In the process of studying for the AP Biology test, I made a [study guide](https://bio.elk.sh) for quizzing yourself.
